name: CASEYRHODES-XMD
description: An Advanced Whatsapp bot ðŸš€ built for fast automation, media tool, and smooth group management developed by Caseyrhodes tech

PREFIX.description: Paste your bot prefix. Note: Don't use null prefix.

MODE.description: Select your bot work type: public, private, inbox, or group.

ANTI_DELETE.description: Set true to show deleted messages.

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Make it true if you want the bot to always appear online.

AUTO_REPLY.description: Make it true if you want automatic reply.

AUTO_STICKER.description: Make it true if you want automatic sticker conversion.

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Make it true for automatic status seen.

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: Make it true for automatic status reaction or like.

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Make it true for auto reply message on status seen.

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: Type custom message for status reply.
AUTO_STATUS_MSG.value: *SEEN YOUR STATUS BY CASEYRHODES TECH ðŸ‡°ðŸ‡ª*

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Put the owner number for bot.

ANTI_LINK.description: Make it true if you want bot to auto remove group links.
